channel.title: Halloween on Geekosaur
channel.description: Recent content in Halloween on Geekosaur

item.title: Happy Halloween!
item.description: Have a happy halloween everyone! It’s been a while since I posted last here, and I didn’t have time to prepare anything horror-themed :( Enjoy the festivities, a pumpkin spiced latte, watch some Dark Shadows (the original soap opera) and listen to the Penny Dreadful OST!
